channel.description: Recent content in stew on Flo's Food and Drink

item.title: Alice's Stew
item.description: 1.25 lbs Minced Beef 1 Bay Leaf I chopped onion 4 large potatoes, chopped into even pieces 1 carrot chopped, into even pieces 1 small tin chopped plum tomatoes 1 x Oxo Beef Stock cube (in approx. 200ml hot water) lightly brown mince in a little oil, add remainder of ingredients, simmer for 1 to 2 hours - until potatoes & carrot cooked. Season.
